solution_line_template: The colony had {current_penguins} - {gained_this_year} = <<{current_penguins}-{gained_this_year}={penguins_before_gain_this_year}>>{penguins_before_gain_this_year} penguins in it at the beginning of this year.

At the beginning of the second year, the colony had {penguins_before_gain_this_year} / {tripled_factor} = <<{penguins_before_gain_this_year}/{tripled_factor}={penguins_beginning_second_year}>>{penguins_beginning_second_year} penguins in it.

At the beginning of the first year, it had {penguins_beginning_second_year} / {doubled_factor} = <<{penguins_beginning_second_year}/{doubled_factor}={penguins_beginning_first_year}>>{penguins_beginning_first_year} penguins in it.
Thus, at the beginning of the first year, the penguin colony was catching {penguins_beginning_first_year} * {fish_per_penguin} = {total_fish_per_day} fish per day.
